page.title: 15CASTLETOWN PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: The school has a)eight full time teachers. Headmaster-Mr L.O.Brown P1-Mrs.J.Adamson P2-Miss M.Swanson P3-Miss S.Speed P4-Mrs.M.Wilson P5-Mrs.J.Morris P6-Mrs.A.Mennie P7-Mrs.M.Humphreys b)five visiting teachers ART-Mrs.O'Donnell P.E.-Mrs.Mowat MUSIC-Mrs.Widdowson CRAFT-Mrs.Gunn REMEDIAL-Mrs.McBay c)178 pupils d)Castletown School Association-made up of people interested in the school. Each year the pupils take part in inter-school football,netball and athletics.The Police organise an inter-school Top of the Form competition for primary schools too. The children also take part in verse- speaking and choirs in the annual Caithness Music Festival.
